values.value: A traffic control plan must be available on site for right-of-way activities. All workers with potential exposure to vehicular or equipment traffic must wear suitable Hi-Vis apparel (ANSI/ISEA 107-2004 Class 2 or Class 3 depending on environmental conditions). Are all construction tasks taking place inside of the designated Activity Area? Flaggers must be trained, training may be state-specific. CFR 1926 subpart G, Manual on Uniform Traffic Control Devices
Are measures in place to effectively mitigate all hazards from motor vehicle and equipment traffic?
